Hey  looks like I'll be stopping full-time Lalamove for now. Found a job and I'll be starting on 1 December. Thanks for the sharing and I benefit greatly from all the sharing here. I sincerely wish all of you the best  and most importantly  stay safe as a Lalamove driver. I'll still do one or two Lalamove deliveries once a month because I want to keep that 20% fuel discount. ðŸ˜‚

Finally  do go to MyCareersFuture website. That's where I found my job. The government will even pay you $3800 if you work under SGUP program. So if you are doing LLM as an interim solution  go there now.
